meanings.sent1: In some cultures, people believe in polygamizing to have more than one spouse.
meanings.sent2: The king was known for polygamizing and having many wives.
meanings.sent3: The idea of polygamizing seemed overwhelming to the young man, who struggled to even commit to one person.
meanings.sent4: Polygamizing can be compared to juggling multiple responsibilities at once.
meanings.sent5: She described polygamizing as trying to balance on a unicycle while juggling flaming torches.

meanings.definition: To have multiple spouses at the same time.
meanings.sent1: Some historical figures were known for polygamizing and having several spouses concurrently.
meanings.sent2: Polygamizing was common in ancient civilizations where it was socially accepted.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom character found himself accidentally polygamizing due to a series of misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Polygamizing is like trying to keep multiple plates spinning in the air without letting any fall.
meanings.sent5: The concept of polygamizing was portrayed in the movie as a complex web of relationships.
